plant.title: Sunflowers
plant.summary: Sunflowers are completely non-toxic to cats and dogs! Their bright blooms and tall stems make them a joyful, pet-safe choice for gardens and bouquets.
plant.what_to_do:
**No toxicity concerns!**

However:
- Large seeds may pose a choking hazard.
- Pesticide-treated garden sunflowers could be riskyâ€”opt for organic if possible.
